Package de.edu.telran.myshop.security

Class KeycloakUtils

java.lang.Object
de.edu.telran.myshop.security.KeycloakUtils
@Service public class KeycloakUtils extends Object
Utility class for interacting with Keycloak.

This class provides methods for creating, updating, deleting, and searching users in a Keycloak realm. It also handles roles and user attributes.

    • initKeyCloak

      @PostConstruct public org.keycloak.admin.client.Keycloak initKeyCloak()
      Initializes the Keycloak instance.

      -@PostConstruct means that this method is called by Spring after bean initialization.

      Returns:
      The initialized Keycloak instance.

    • createKeycloakUser

      public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createKeycloakUser(User user)
      Creates a new user in Keycloak.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be created.
      Returns:
      The response from Keycloak indicating the success or failure of the user creation.

    • addRoles

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(String userId)
      Deletes a user from the Keycloak realm.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to be deleted.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user with the provided ID is not found.

    • findUserById

      public org.keycloak.representations.idm.UserRepresentation findUserById(String userId)
      Retrieves a user's representation by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The UserRepresentation object representing the user.

    • searchUserByText

      public List<org.keycloak.representations.idm.UserRepresentation> searchUserByText(String text)
      Searches for users in the Keycloak realm based on a text attribute.
      Parameters:
      text - The text attribute to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of UserRepresentation objects matching the search criteria.

    • getAll

      public List<org.keycloak.representations.idm.UserRepresentation> getAll()
      Retrieves a list of all users in the Keycloak realm.
      Returns:
      A list of UserRepresentation objects representing all users.

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(UserDTO user)
      Updates a user's information in the Keycloak realm.
      Parameters:
      user - The UserDTO object containing the updated user information.
